resources.string: Welcome to Android Auto Apps Downloader (AAAD). This utility will help install custom apps on Android Auto for non rooted phones. Select the app you want to install and wait for the installer to come up. App descriptions are available on long press.

The free version of AAAD allows you to have one free download each month. If you want to enjoy unlimited free downloads, you can switch to PRO version and you will enjoy full functionalities and app updates!
You are about to download %1$s. Do you wish to continue?
At the end of the payment please manually press \"Return to merchant\" for the transaction to be validated.
Next download will be available on: %1$s

"AAAD (Android Auto Apps Downloader) is developed and mantained by Shmykelsa.

The available apps are made possible by the following developers:
"
Alternative to AAMirror with some more functionalities.
This app was made for allowing passengers to manage some functionalities in Android Auto. Requires the passenger to download AAPassenger. Working state is currently unknown.
The most complete and full-featured mirroring app for Android Auto. Includes many features like a customizable launcher, split screen, custom screen sizes and much more!
The first and long-lasting screen mirror app for Android Auto. The ancestor of a family, AAMirror simply mirrors the screen of your phone to the car.
Another alternative to AAMirror with some extra functionalities. Recently revived and fixed for newer Android versions by Annexhack.

Formerly known as \"YouTube Auto\", CarStream was one of the first apps made with the custom apps SDK. It was born with the main purpose of delivering YouTube to Android Auto and then it became a web browser with many capabilities.

"The most complete video and audio player for Android Auto, featuring a full player experience with many features such as network streams and also a web browser. It also comes with the companion app Fermata Control that allows to manage the playback outside the app and from the controls on steering wheel."
You will be redirected to screen2auto website. From there, select the version and open with AAAD.
You are going to install Screen2Auto. Do you want to continue?
Born with one single task. Bring a widget to Android Auto!

This is a performance monitor, based on Martoreto\'s aa-stats. It\'s made specifically for use with the Volkswagen/Skoda/Seat/Audi MIB2 infotainment units, but it might also work on others, as long as they have Android Auto support. Needs also VAG extension to work on Volkswagen Cars.
You are eligible for a 15% off

With the new navigation apps coming into Android Auto, many of them lack of Google Assistant\'s support to navigate to addresses of contacts saved in the phone book. Nav2Contacts come to rescue! First, select the navigation app you want to use, then search the contact you want to navigate to and start the navigation right away!
PLEASE remember to press the blue button \"Return to merchant website\" after payment is complete
Do you want to send an e-mail for help right now?
I want to transfer license here
I want to transfer license from here
If you want to transfer the license from one phone to the other, you are in the right place. Please select what you want to do
Are you sure that you want to transfer the license to this device?
Great, now open the device that you want to transfer the license from and select \"I want to transfer the license from here\", then scan this QR code
You don\'t have an active license on this device
The camera permission is needed to scan a QR code
Преостаје мање од 1 сата до следећег преузимања
Ова апликација НИЈЕ повезана са softonic.com, uptodown.com или aadapk.com, aadapk.app. Једини званични извор је github.com

Ova alatka će pomoći u instaliranju prilagođenih aplikacija na Android Auto za telefone bez root pristupa. Pređite prstom da naučite kako da koristite aplikaciju, zatim dodelite potrebne dozvole da biste počeli.
Izaberite aplikaciju koju želite da instalirate i sačekajte da se pojavi sistemski instalater.
Ako niste sigurni koju aplikaciju da instalirate, dugo pritisnite dugme da vidite opis.
Доделите дозволе за инсталирање прилагођених апликација
Required to install APK files from external sources
Get notified about download progress and app updates
Привремено онемогућите да бисте дозволили инсталирање прилагођених апликација
Google Play Protect може блокирати инсталирање прилагођених апликација. Морате га привремено онемогућити или дозволити AAAD када се то затражи.
Ne mogu da otvorim aplikaciju - aktivnost pokretanja nije pronađena
Прикажи овај QR код да пренесеш лиценцу на овај уређај
На уређају са PRO, отвори AAAD и иди на Пренеси лиценцу
Додирни дугме Скенирај QR код на том уређају
Скенирај овај QR код да завршиш пренос
Пренеси своју лиценцу на нови уређај
⚠️ Упозорење: Преношењем лиценце уклонићеш PRO статус са овог уређаја и активираћеш га на новом уређају. Ова радња се не може опозвати.
Отвори AAAD на свом новом уређају
QR код ће се појавити на новом уређају
Додирни дугме испод и скенирај тај QR код
Потребна је дозвола камере за скенирање QR кодова
Неуспела провера статуса лиценце. Покушај поново.
Неуспело скенирање QR кода. Покушај поново.
Да ли си сигуран да желиш да пренесеш своју PRO лиценцу на нови уређај? Ово ће уклонити PRO са овог уређаја.
Имаш проблеме са AAAD? Пошаљи нам имејл и јавићемо ти се што пре. Што више детаља дашможемо брже да помогнемо!
Препоручено - Помаже нам да брже решимо проблеме. Садржи само информације о уређају и конфигурацију апликације, без личних података.
Поштујемо твоју приватност. У записима нема личних информација, лозинки или података о плаћању.
Неуспело генерисање записа, шаљемо имејл без прилога
Неуспело отварање имејл апликације. Молимо пошаљи имејл директно на help.aaad@gmail.com.
This app respects your privacy. We do not collect, store, or share any personal information without your consent. For more information, please contact us.
